test-method.name: loginWithSeleniumAndGetCookie
test-method.description: Login to OrangeHRM using Selenium and retrieve session cookie

test-method.name: getSubunitsTree
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/subunits?mode=tree' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Validate the request uses proper Rest Assured methods (given, cookie, get, response) 4. Validate that the response contains non-empty 'id' and 'name' fields in the 'data' list 5. Validate response status code is 200 and status line is 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK' 6. Print the full response body for verification

test-method.name: postUniquePaygrade
test-method.description: 1. Dynamically generate a unique pay grade name using a helper method 2. Send a POST request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/pay-grades' endpoint with a valid cookie and the generated name in the request body 3. Extract and store the ID and name of the newly created pay grade from the response 4. Print the generated ID, name, request body, status code, and response body for verification 5. Assert that ID and name are not null 6. Assert that the status code is 200 and validate implementation correctness using RestAssured methods

test-method.name: deleteValidUsers
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/users' to fetch user list 2. Extract a valid user ID for deletion (excluding Admin) 3. Construct the DELETE request body with the extracted ID in format: {"ids": [id]} 4. Send a DELETE request to '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/users' with a valid cookie and body 5. Assert that the status code is 200 and implementation uses only RestAssured methods
